title: Why Trump can’t run for a third term despite selling ‘Trump 2028' hats
shortDescription: Rep. Hakeem Jeffries said Trump 2028 hats, which are $50 apiece, “randomly appeared” during a meeting in the Oval Office. Can Trump run for a 3rd term?

title: TrumpRx, Pfizer deal explained. Info about drug discount website
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced a deal with Pfizer to lower drug prices for some Americans. The White House is also unveiling a TrumpRx website.

title: Supreme Court rejects Trump bid to immediately fire Lisa Cook from Fed
shortDescription: Trump is the first president to try to fire a Federal Reserve governor. The law's "for cause" removal requirement has never been tested in court.

title: Senate deadlock triggers US federal government shutdown
shortDescription: The US federal government has officially shut down for the first time in six years after a deadlocked Congress failed to reach a funding deal.

title: Government shutdown begins as Congress fails to reach funding deal
shortDescription: Congressional leaders have been at an impasse over funding legislation. Did they reach a deal before the government shutdown deadline?

title: Trump has played a role in five shutdowns since taking office in 2017
shortDescription: The government has repeatedly shut down since Ronald Reagan was president, but Trump has overseen the longest.

title: Trump withdraws economist picked to lead US jobs data office
shortDescription: The White House said Trump will announce a new pick "very soon" to lead the Bureau of Labor Statistics after withdrawing E.J. Antoni's nomination.

title: See which Democrats broke ranks to fund the government
shortDescription: Several Democrats split with their party to keep the federal government open.

title: Trump says 'a lot of good' can come from shutdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said a government shutdown could help "get rid of" Democrat policies.

title: Senate votes on a government shutdown: What to know
shortDescription: The Senate is set to vote again on Tuesday on dueling measures to fund the government. Neither is likely to pass.

title: Senate deadlocked over health care spending
shortDescription: Senators are deadlocked over Medicaid cuts and ACA subsidies as a government shutdown looms.

title: Trump doubles funding for AI-enabled pediatric cancer research
shortDescription: The new executive order signed Sept. 30 infuses another $50 million into the program annually.
